channel.title: Good Game Spawn Point
channel.description: Good Game Spawn Point: The show for younger gamers by gamers.
channel.itunes:author: ABC TV
channel.itunes:summary: Hosted by passionate gamers Hex and Bajo and not so nice Robot, Darren (Data Analysing Robot for the Ruthless Extermination of Noobs)

item.title: Good Game Spawn Point Episode 22, 2012
item.description: Good Game Spawn Point - Series 3: Episode Bajo, Hex and D.A.R.R.E.N. review Pokemon Conquest as well as answer more questions in Ask Good Game, and we head down to the Game Masters exhibition in Melbourne.
item.itunes:author: ABC TV
item.itunes:summary: Good Game Spawn Point - Episode Bajo, Hex and D.A.R.R.E.N. review Pokemon Conquest as well as answer more questions in Ask Good Game, and we head down to the Game Masters exhibition in Melbourne.
item.itunes:keywords: games, gamer, abc, tv, pc, computer

item.title: Good Game Spawn Point Episode 21, 2012
item.description: Good Game Spawn Point - Series 3: Episode Bajo, Hex and D.A.R.R.E.N. review Swordigo and LEGO Batman 2: DC Super Heroes as well as answer more questions in Ask Good Game, and Goose meets a DDR gamer who is also a dance teacher.
item.itunes:author: ABC TV
item.itunes:summary: Good Game Spawn Point - Episode Bajo, Hex and D.A.R.R.E.N. review Swordigo and LEGO Batman 2: DC Super Heroes as well as answer more questions in Ask Good Game, and Goose meets a DDR gamer who is also a dance teacher.

item.title: Good Game Spawn Point Episode 1, 2012
item.description: Good Game Spawn Point - Series 3: Episode Bajo, Hex and D.A.R.R.E.N. are back for another year of gaming goodness! This week, we give a full review for the full release of Minecraft, as well as the new Professor Layton game, Goose takes a look at how games are classified and we answer more questions in Ask Good Game...
